caption: Jean Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine (French, 1745–1830), formerly attributed to Ferdinand Bol (Dutch, 1616–1680), formerly attributed to Carel Fabritius (Dutch, 1622–1654), Alexander before Diogenes. Oil on canvas; 37.2 x 45 cm, 63 × 71 × 10 cm (frame). Museum purchase, gift of Carl Otto von Kienbusch, Class of 1906, for the Carl Otto von Kienbusch Jr., Memorial Collection (y1953-48)
